channel.title: novel on Null Comment
channel.description: Recent content in novel on Null Comment

item.title: All the Lovers in the Night
item.description: The light at the end of the tunnel is rather dim. 8/10

item.title: Lonely Castle in the Mirror
item.description: Magical climax with a total flop of a post-credit scene. 7/10

item.title: Scythe
item.description: One of the coolest fictional worlds I’ve seen. The Thunderhead is hella cute. 9/10

item.title: Heaven
item.description: This book’s sole purpose is to be depressing. 7/10

item.title: Klara and the Sun
item.description: I guess humanity wasn’t that special after all. 8/10

item.title: The Shining Sea
item.description: Extremely well written but weak story. 6/10

item.title: Wait for Me Yesterday in Spring
item.description: Cool narrative structure going backwards. Some scenes were weird though. 7/10

item.title: I Will Forget This Feeling Someday
item.description: The story isn’t great, but the method it’s told is fascinating and the dialogue carries some heavy feels. 8/10
